review.reviewBody: prices seem high but portions are awesome and they LOAD those pancakes. highly recommend
I heard rly good  things about this restaurant but the breakfast poutine was not it!!! It was dry , not enough sauce and the egg was supposed to be soft and runny  which wasn't. Not happy.
Its kinda expensive but everything there is amazing and taste so good and the portions are big!
everything was perfect, from the eggs to hashbrowns and ham/bacon/sausage all fresh and delicious and the pancakes are amazing
everything tasted amazing, the ingredients all fresh and high quality and some of the best hollandaise sauce I've had
